mapper.insert: insert into tb_sms ( sms_code, receive_code, send_phone, request_id, receive_phone, receive_title, receive_content, sms_point, receive_date) values( NEXTVAL(seq_sms_code), #{type}, #{send}, #{requestId}, #{phone}, #{title}, #{content}, default, #{date})
mapper.select:
select sms_code, receive_code, request_id, receive_phone, receive_title, receive_content, sms_point, date_format(receive_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as reDate from tb_sms
receive_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') || receive_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') || receive_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
${field} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by reDate DESC, sms_code DESC
